com.revolverobotics.kubiapi
Class Kubi

java.lang.Object
  BluetoothGattCallback
      com.revolverobotics.kubiapi.GattInterface
          com.revolverobotics.kubiapi.Kubi

public class Kubi
extends GattInterface

This class provides functions for controlling a kubi directly. It provides an interface for sending move commands, changing the color of the activity indicator and performing gestures.
NB Using this class directly to connect/disconnect from Kubis should be avoided, instead use the KubiManager class.

Author:
Oliver Rice

Method Detail

servoAngle

public static int servoAngle(float angle)
Converts a given angle to the servo value

Parameters:
angle - Angle in degrees
Returns:
The value for the servo's goal position register.

servoSpeed

public static int servoSpeed(float speed)
Converts a given speed to the servo value. The actual speed may vary due to load on the the servo.

Parameters:
speed - Rotation speed in degrees/second
Returns:
The value for the servo speed register

moveTo

public void moveTo(float pan,
                   float tilt)
Move to a given pan and tilt. This will move at default speed with smoothing enabled.

Parameters:
pan - Pan angle in degrees
tilt - Tilt angle in degrees.

moveTo

public void moveTo(float pan,
                   float tilt,
                   float speed)
Move to a given pan and tilt at a given speed.

Parameters:
pan - Pan angle in degrees
tilt - Tilt angle in degrees
speed - Turn rate in degrees/second

moveTo

public void moveTo(float pan,
                   float tilt,
                   float speed,
                   boolean smooth)
Move to a given pan and tilt at a given speed.

Parameters:
pan - Pan angle in degrees
tilt - Tilt angle in degrees
speed - Turn rate in degrees/second
smooth - If enabled, the pan or tilt speed will be changed so that the move will be done in a single smooth motion.

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Disconnect this kubi. Avoid using this, instead use KubiManager.disconnect()

Set the kubi's status indicator to a certain color

Parameters:
red - Red component (0-255)
green - Green component (0-255)
blue - Blue component (0-255)
